message.body: Hey how's it going?
I'm thinking about developing a fear of snakes because I feel maybe I should fear them more than I do.
Are you working on anything on this way to hot summers day?
Hey, good how about you?
Not too bad. Just had breakfast and spent a few mins in the garden. Now I'm in the ac doing work.
Where r u located
Haha what made you decide you should start fearing snakes more? They are pretty creepy lil creatures
I'm in queens where are you located?
I saw a news report this morning about a man who sat on the toilet and got bit by a snake that was hiding in there.
I'm not doing much I may go outside and do some reading but not for too long it's way too hot!
I'm in west Philadelphia!
What kinda stuff do you read?
I'm reading the fifth book in the game of thrones series, do you watch the show?
That's terrifying about the snake in the toilet! Ahh
Where was this guy? Hopefully some exotic snake filled land and not a city right?
I saw the first two seasons and was pretty into it but haven't seen any of the 3 rd yet.
Are the GofT books good?
Yeah the snake thing freaked me out. I think he was hunkering down to fill out the mornings paperwork and got bit right on his unit's major general.
I think he was on Florida
What a morning he had!
I just looked at the weather and it 105 in Philly!
Wow sorry I just noticed you had responded before! ugh sometimes my phone is really flaky and doesn't tell me when I get messages
The game of thrones books are really really good! I watched the first two seasons and then started reading the books I really recommend them if you likethe show!
I was just outside reading and I didn't last very long it's way too hot to be out there!
Yeah I really like the plot north of the wall and am not a big fan of the plot of the dragon princess girl
But the whole thing is rather Shakespearian cuz all the characters die
Aw really I like Dany and her dragons! Although I'm not a fan of what she's been up to in this most recent book!
I guess on the tv sho I just didn't like how that plot line was cast and the cgi dragons were a problem for me.

Yeah I definitely like her better in the book, I think because the author lets you know what she's thinking and why she makes certain decisions there's way more back story for every character he's an incredible author!
It seems like he must be a great author to weave all those plot lines together
What do you do in queens? Are you a student?
I just graduated in may with my masters I'm not working now but I'm starting a job with americorps in August
What about you? Are you a student?
I finished grad school a few years ago
What are you doing with americorps
What did you get your degree in?
MFA
I'm working with a reading tutoring program in the public schools
That's great! How old are the kids you will be working with?
They'll be from 2nd to 5th grade I'm excited! I can't wait to start doing something I've been pretty bored haha
Great age! They are grown up enough to really have conversations with but not teenagers who think they know it all.
Yeah I volunteered as a tutor with the program last year (this year I'll be a site coordinator) and the kids were so much fun
That's cool is it in queens?
The schools I'm working with are but the program is citywide
It's good to work in the community you live in I think
Yeah I'm glad they placed me in queens it would've been a long commute to work in Harlem or the Bronx
How long have you lived there? Is it where u grew up?
No I've lived here for five years I went to school at St. John's
I grew up in a small town in Connecticut
Did you grow up in Philadelphia?
No I grew up in upstate ny near Syracuse. I've lived here for 8 years
Oh wow it must've been cold up there! Why did you decided to move?
Because it was cold up there!
No just kidding, I left to go to undergrad
Hahaha I keep saying I need to move somewhere where it never gets cold!
That's the same reason I left my hometown, also I was bored of living in the middle of nowhere and wanted to try out the big city haha
Yeah I wanted some place warmer but this is way too warm today
I gotta move to Seattle or something
Haha yeah I don't like this humidity and crazy heat I'm thinking an island somewhere get that ocean breeze
The UK
London is rarely hot in summer and only snows once every few years.
